derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (originally denoting a man's short jacket): from single (because the garment was unlined) + -et, on the pattern of doublet

entry.tran: (运动员或拳击选手穿的)背心，无袖汗衫，运动背心
entry.def: A singlet is a sleeveless sports shirt worn by athletes and boxers.

example.tran: 一件脏兮兮的跑步背心

entry.def: A singlet is a plain sleeveless piece of underwear which is worn on the upper half of the body.
